title: Video shows off what Windows 11 wallpaper stickers look like
content:
A while back, we reported that Microsoft is working on wallpaper stickers for Windows 11, giving users more personalization options. While it’s been a few weeks, this new feature isn’t officially available for Windows Insiders, but that doesn’t mean we don’t know what it will look like. Twitter user Albacore, who had first discovered the

The post Video shows off what Windows 11 wallpaper stickers look like appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The upcoming wallpaper stickers feature for Windows 11 has been uncovered in a new video, showing how adding and resizing stickers works.
